description: This file defines the NoteListFragment class, which is a fragment in an Android application responsible for displaying a list of notes, handling note selection, and refreshing the list by fetching data from a Supabase backend.

classes.name: NoteListFragment
classes.description: A fragment responsible for displaying a list of notes, handling user interactions, and loading note data from a backend service.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Attaches the fragment to its context and ensures the context implements the NoteSelectedListener interface.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout, initializes UI components, sets click listeners, and loads the notes.

methods.name: refreshNotes
methods.description: Public method that triggers reloading of the notes list.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the backend and updates the UI accordingly, handling success and error cases.
